title: I wasted my champion shards!
body: I opened a chest and got a renekton champion shard. But in trying to upgrade him to permanent I just turned them into blue essence. Is there any way to undo this?

replies.body:
We won't be able to make this kind of adjustment here on the boards. When you go to disenchant or upgrade a shard to permanent, a confirmation window pops up asking if you're sure you want to proceed. 

Because of that confirmation and due to how to hextech loot system works, we cannot give any type of refund on shards. Be sure to check out our [**refund policy**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751864-Content-Refund-FAQ) if you're ever wondering if something can be refunded or not.
